pull.title: Use C++17 std::array deduction for OUTPUT_TYPES, ALL_FEE_ESTIMATE_HORIZONS
pull.body: With the new C++17 array deduction rules, an array encompassing all values in an enum can be specified in the same header file that specifies the enum. This is useful to avoid having to repeatedly enumerate all enum values in the code. E.g. the RPC code, but also the fuzz code.

events.body: @mjdietzx Your `ack` won't get picked up by the merge script, btw. It needs to be any kind of `ACK`.

ACK fa6a79d859c82c2efc0cf7227cea922d5fc5d55a

Thanks for the offline explanation @MarcoFalke on the differences between C++11 and C++17 std::array.
